diagnoses: explanation:Autoimmune disorder that can cause anemia
and skin rashes including on the lips.}
explanation:Childhood illness causing blood vessel inflammation
and anemia in some cases. Pyuria can occur but is less common.}
explanation:Condition involving anemia due to red blood cell destruction
kidney failure which can cause pyuria
but in some cases can lead to anemia
and sometimes pyuria or anemia due to secondary bacterial infection.}
explanation:Viral infection that can lead to severe anemia
and in rare cases pyuria due to kidney involvement.}
explanation:Rare autoimmune vasculitis that may involve the kidneys causing pyuria
explanation:Blood cancer that can cause anemia
and pyuria if the kidneys are infiltrated. Lip erythema would be atypical.}
explanation:A systemic viral infection causing conjunctivitis and lip erythema
complicated by bacterial conjunctivitis and urinary tract infection.}
